Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Collector's Call
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: Call for the collection of soulstones that you harbour. They will be placed in an infinity circuit and increase the power of Ynnead.

Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Host the Harlequins
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: Call for a troupe of Harlequins to visit you and perform their art to please Cegorach.

Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Homage to Khaine
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: Allow a single Eldar to briefly give in to Khaine's bloodlust, gaining the favour of the Red Handed God. Risks drawing the wrong attention.

Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Prophet of Ynnead
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: The selected Eldar becomes a prophet of Ynnead to other Aeldari.

Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Puppeteer of Cegorach
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: The selected Eldar becomes a favourite of the Laughing God.

Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.label: Scion of Khaine
Corruption.Worship.Wonders.WonderDef.description: The selected Eldar is lost on the Path of the Warrior, forever locked into battling the enemies of the Aeldari.
